skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: Azeem-2

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no code execution capabilities. Contains only documentation and theme definition files with color palettes and font pairings. No network calls, no file writes, no external commands, no environment access.

content.value_statement: Creating consistent, professional visual styling for presentations takes significant time and design expertise. This skill provides 10 curated color and font themes that can be instantly applied to any artifact, plus the ability to generate custom themes on-demand.
actual_capabilities: Apply 10 pre-set professional themes to presentations and documents
Generate custom themes based on natural language descriptions
Access complete color palettes with hex codes
Use curated font pairings for headers and body text
Display visual theme showcase for user selection
Maintain consistent visual identity across all slides
limitations: Does not modify actual presentation files directly
Cannot import themes from external sources
Limited to built-in font families (DejaVu Sans, FreeSans, FreeSerif)
Theme customization requires natural language description input

use_cases.title: Corporate presentation styling
use_cases.description: Apply Ocean Depths or Modern Minimalist themes for polished corporate decks and financial reports

use_cases.title: Marketing material design
use_cases.description: Use Sunset Boulevard or Golden Hour themes for vibrant creative pitches and brand presentations

use_cases.title: Academic presentation themes
use_cases.description: Select Forest Canopy or Arctic Frost themes for environmental, healthcare, or technology content

prompt_templates.title: Apply a pre-set theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to this presentation deck

prompt_templates.title: Browse available themes
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all available themes so I can choose one for my presentation

prompt_templates.title: Generate custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new theme inspired by autumn colors with warm oranges and deep browns

prompt_templates.title: Match theme to content
prompt_templates.prompt: I am creating a presentation about sustainable energy. Recommend a theme and apply it

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my presentation
output: Applied Forest Canopy theme with colors: Forest Green (#2d4a2b), Sage (#7d8471), Olive (#a4ac86), Ivory (#faf9f6)
Headers use FreeSerif Bold, body text uses FreeSans
Best suited for environmental presentations, sustainability reports, and organic product content

best_practices: Show the theme showcase PDF to users before selection so they can preview all options
Get explicit confirmation of theme choice before applying to ensure user satisfaction
Consider the audience and context when recommending themes for different content types
anti_patterns: Applying themes without showing options or getting user confirmation
Mixing themes inconsistently within the same presentation
Using themes with poor contrast for the intended content or audience

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Theme Factory works with Claude, Claude Code, and Codex for styling presentations and documents.

faq.question: How many themes are included?
faq.answer: Ten professionally designed themes cover styles from corporate to creative with complete color palettes.

faq.question: Can I create custom themes?
faq.answer: Yes. Describe your desired colors and mood to generate a new theme with matching fonts and hex codes.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill contains no code and does not access files, network, or external services.

faq.question: Why is my theme not applying?
faq.answer: Ensure you have selected a theme and provided the artifact type. Some tools may require separate styling steps.

faq.question: How is this different from manual styling?
faq.answer: This skill provides instant access to professionally curated color and font combinations without manual design work.
